DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct United States America ( USA ) . The aim trial compare efficacy safety two different formulation insulin degludec ( IDeg ) subject type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two Insulin Degludec Formulations Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
